column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=What are your views on the mixed member proportional representation ( MMP ) referendum ?
#Text=Ontario must change the way we vote .
#Text=FPTP works when there are two parties .
#Text=We have n't had that for a long time .
#Text=What we get now is artificial majorities , where as little as 38 % of the vote gets a majority of the seats .
#Text=MMP is not perfect .
#Text=But it takes the best aspects of FPTP and PR , and combines them into a workable system that will better serve voters .
#Text=Especially voters who are n't happy with traditional politicking in Ontario .
#Text=What role , if any , does " new media " play in your campaign , and the campaign of your party ?
#Text=( websites , blogs , Facebook , YouTube videos , etc )
#Text=Do you view it as beneficial , or a challenge ?
#Text=I had wanted to do more , but there is so much tradtional politics that new media got sidelined a little .
#Text=I did get a couple of videos filmed , and they are posted .
#Text=The GPO is aggressively pursuing new media exposure , because we are being largely ignored by big media .
#Text=Local media is doing a much better job , but big papers and TV have left us out of the discussion .
#Text=It is largely beneficial , since our focus as a party is on a sustainable future , and that appeals to younger demographics who are more likely to pay attention to new media .
#Text=It is , however , a challenge .
#Text=The Internet is a really big place , and you have to be loud , funny or interesting to be noticed .
#Text=" Hipness " becomes an issue the way charisma did when TV got involved , and the well orchestrated soundbite can now when an election .
#Text=I wish it was different , that ideas would carry the most weight , but ideas can be spread by YouTube and Facebook pretty well .
#Text=Of the decisions made by Ontario 's 38th Legislative Assembly , which was the most beneficial to your this electoral district ?
#Text=To the province as a whole ?
#Text=Which was least beneficial , or even harmful , to your this riding ?
#Text=To the province as a whole ?
#Text=The best decision was to replace lost funding for health care and education .
#Text=We 've taken steps that will help repair these vital social services .
#Text=More must be done , but immediate funding was desperately needed .
#Text=This helped my riding and every other riding in Ontario .
#Text=The worst decision was to not close the coal fired generating plants .
#Text=They are responsible for about a quarter of Ontario 's GHG emissions , and climate change is going to cost us a hell of a lot , and not just in economic terms .
#Text=This costs all Ontarians , even those not born yet .
#Text=If we had focussed on conservation , rather than nuclear , would have been able to get those plants shut down , and been well on our way to meeting our Kyoto targets .
